articles.description: L.A. County is in the yellow tier of the state's COVID recovery plan, allowing for the broadest reopening of the economy since the pandemic began.
articles.content:
Thursday morning Los Angeles County entered the yellow tier of the states reopening blueprint, allowing for the broadest reopening of the economy since the pandemic began more than a year ago.

articles.title: Avelo Setting Up First East Coast Base In New Haven - One Mile at a Time
articles.description: After recently launching operations in Burbank, Avelo Airlines has revealed that New Haven will be its first base on the East Coast.
articles.content: Avelo Airlines is the newest airline in the USA. The airline launched operations last week, initially flying from Burbank to 11 destinations on the West Coast, while offering incredibly low fares. Th… [+3563 chars]

articles.author: Michael Gold
articles.title: NYC Plans $25 Million Program to Put Artists Back to Work - The New York Times
articles.description: The move is intended to support artists whose income plummeted during the pandemic and who have clamored for government relief.
articles.content: The city has already established several initiatives meant to help bolster the struggling arts community, including a program to allow outdoor performances on designated city streets. It also introdu… [+1219 chars]
